body_html: I may have been mistaken about the previous behavior. I do know about log_device_placement, but prefer op.device as it's easier to work with it programmatically, especially with very large unfolded graphs that have hundreds of thousands of nodes. If there's some way to provide an alternative mechanism to probe actual device placement programmatically from within python that would be fantastic.

body: I may have been mistaken about the previous behavior. I do know about `log_device_placement`, but prefer `op.device` as it's easier to work with it programmatically, especially with very large unfolded graphs that have hundreds of thousands of nodes. If there's some way to provide an alternative mechanism to probe actual device placement programmatically from within python that would be fantastic.
